title: composite_trigger_child_firing
content: # `prefect.server.events.models.composite_trigger_child_firing` ## Functions ### `upsert_child_firing` ```python theme={null} upsert_child_firing(db: PrefectDBInterface, session: AsyncSession, firing: Firing) ``` ### `get_child_firings` ```python theme={null} get_child_firings(db: PrefectDBInterface, session: AsyncSession, trigger: CompositeTrigger) -> Sequence['ORMCompositeTriggerChildFiring'] ``` ### `clear_old_child_firings` ```python theme={null} clear_old_child_firings(db: PrefectDBInterface, session: AsyncSession, trigger: CompositeTrigger, fired_before: DateTime) -> None ``` ### `clear_child_firings` ```python theme={null} clear_child_firings(db: PrefectDBInterface, session: AsyncSession, trigger: CompositeTrigger, firing_ids: Sequence[UUID]) -> None ```
